categories: Category:Plants of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Quench-gourds were plants native to the planet Kalevala, a desert world located in the Outer Rim's Mandalore system. Kalevalan quench-gourds were known to split open when they became overly ripe.

The quench-gourd was first introduced to Star Wars canon via a mention in The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett, a bounty hunter-centric reference guide co-authored by Jason Fry, Daniel Wallace, and Ryder Windham, published October 15, 2013.
